plot: Better Connecticut, part of The Better Show family, is a daily lifestyle talk show which promotes local CT stories, cultural events and news, combined with segments on cooking, decoration and health.
plot_en: Better Connecticut, part of The Better Show family, is a daily lifestyle talk show which promotes local CT stories, cultural events and news, combined with segments on cooking, decoration and health.

title: Better Connecticut
